Description:
Lead and supervise a team of technicians in the Mechanical, Technical, and Utility department.
Ensure the team follows standard operating procedures, safety guidelines, and quality standards.
Assign work tasks and responsibilities to team members based on their skills and expertise.
Monitor and manage the team's performance, providing feedback, coaching, and support as needed.
Conduct regular performance evaluations, setting performance goals and objectives for team members.
Coordinate and prioritize work schedules to ensure timely completion of service jobs and customer requests.
Monitor the progress of ongoing service jobs, addressing any issues or challenges that may arise.
Provide technical guidance and support to the team, assisting in complex problem-solving and troubleshooting.
Maintain effective communication with customers, keeping them informed about service progress and addressing their concerns.
Collaborate with other departments, such as Parts and Sales, to ensure seamless coordination and customer satisfaction.
Identify training and development needs within the team and coordinate training programs to enhance technical skills and knowledge.
Ensure compliance with warranty procedures, warranty claim processing, and documentation requirements.
Monitor and control service-related costs, ensuring efficient utilization of resources and adherence to budgetary guidelines.
Stay updated with the latest industry trends, technological advancements, and service procedures to enhance the team's expertise.
Foster a positive team culture, encouraging teamwork, collaboration, and a customer-centric approach.
Implement continuous improvement initiatives to enhance service efficiency and customer satisfaction.
Handle customer escalations and complaints, working towards effective resolution and customer retention.
Maintain accurate service records, reports, and documentation related to team performance, service jobs, and customer interactions.
Adhere to company policies, procedures, and ethical standards, promoting a safe and inclusive work environment.
Stay abreast of industry regulations and compliance requirements, ensuring the team's adherence to legal and regulatory obligations.
Perform other department duties related to his/her position as directed by the Head of the DepartmentSkills
